kpi.name: M8006C62

kpi_info.title: Modification attempts for E-RABs of QCI8
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI8. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI8 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi.kpi_alias: Modification attempts for E-RABs of QCI8
